languages.text: {n}Старица переводит взгляд на Ульфара.{/n} "Большой дух Бога-Орла, мы рады тебе. Эта правительница укажет смазать суставы твоей железной кожи маслом из желудей лютодуба, чтобы их не коснулась ржа. И нарисовать на твоей драгоценной коже священные символы, чтобы духи этого места не боялись тебя".

{n}The elder shifts her gaze to Ulfar.{/n} "Great spirit of the Eagle-God, we are glad to see you. This ruler will have the joints of your iron skin anointed with the oil of dire oak acorns so that they never corrode. And she will have sacred symbols drawn on your precious skin so that the spirits of this place may have no fear of you."
languages.original_text: {n}Старица переводит взгляд на Ульфара.{/n} "Большой дух Бога-Орла, мы рады тебе. Эта правительница укажет смазать суставы твоей железной кожи маслом из желудей лютодуба, чтобы их не коснулась ржа. И нарисовать на твоей драгоценной коже священные символы, чтобы духи этого места не боялись тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}The elderly priestess shifts her gaze to Ulfar.{/n} "Great spirit of the Eagle-God, we are glad to see you. This ruler is going to have the joints of your iron skin anointed with the oil of Dire Oak acorns, so that rust may not touch them. And she will have sacred symbols drawn on your precious skin, so that the spirits of this place may have no fear of you."

languages.text: {n}老妇人将目光转向乌尔法。{/n}“伟大的鹰神之灵啊，我们很高兴见到你。此酋长要在你铁皮的接口处图上黑橡树的圣油，这样你的铁皮就永远不会被腐蚀了。此酋长还要在你神圣的皮肤上画下神圣的印记，这样这片地区的精魂就不会再惧怕你了。”
languages.original_text: {n}The elder shifts her gaze to Ulfar.{/n} "Great spirit of the Eagle-God, we are glad to see you. This ruler will have the joints of your iron skin anointed with the oil of dire oak acorns so that they never corrode. And she will have sacred symbols drawn on your precious skin so that the spirits of this place may have no fear of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}年迈的女祭司将目光转向乌尔法。{/n}“伟大的鹰神之灵啊，我们很高兴见到你。此酋长要在你铁皮的接口处图上黑橡树的圣油，这样你的铁皮就永远不会被腐蚀了。此酋长还要在你神圣的皮肤上画下神圣的印记，这样这片地区的精魂就不会再惧怕你了。”

languages.text: {n}Die Älteste blickt Ulfar an.{/n} "Großer Geist des Adler-Gottes, wir freuen uns, Euch zu sehen. Diese Herrscherin wird die Gelenke Eurer Eisenhaut mit dem Öl der Frucht der Düstereiche salben lassen, auf dass sie niemals rosten. Und sie wird heilige Symbole auf Eure kostbare Haut malen lassen, auf dass die hiesigen Geister Euch nicht fürchten."
languages.original_text: {n}The elder shifts her gaze to Ulfar.{/n} "Great spirit of the Eagle-God, we are glad to see you. This ruler will have the joints of your iron skin anointed with the oil of dire oak acorns so that they never corrode. And she will have sacred symbols drawn on your precious skin so that the spirits of this place may have no fear of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die alte Priesterin blickt Ulfar an.{/n} "Großer Geist des Adler-Gottes, wir freuen uns, Euch zu sehen. Diese Herrscherin wird die Gelenke Eurer Eisenhaut mit dem Öl der Frucht der Düstereiche salben lassen, auf dass sie niemals rosten. Und sie wird heilige Symbole auf Eure kostbare Haut malen lassen, auf dass die hiesigen Geister Euch nicht fürchten."

languages.text: {n}La anciana dirige su mirada hacia Ulfar.{/n} «Gran espíritu del Dios Águila, nos alegra mucho verte. Esta jefa mandará ungir las articulaciones de tu piel de hierro con aceite de bellota de gigarroble para que no se corroa jamás. Y hará que dibujen símbolos sagrados en tu preciada piel para que los espíritus de este lugar no te teman».
languages.original_text: {n}The elder shifts her gaze to Ulfar.{/n} "Great spirit of the Eagle-God, we are glad to see you. This ruler will have the joints of your iron skin anointed with the oil of dire oak acorns so that they never corrode. And she will have sacred symbols drawn on your precious skin so that the spirits of this place may have no fear of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}La anciana sacerdotisa dirige su mirada hacia Ulfar.{/n} «Gran espíritu del Dios Águila, nos alegra mucho verte. Esta jefa mandará ungir las articulaciones de tu piel de hierro con aceite de bellota de gigarroble para que no se corroa jamás. Y hará que dibujen símbolos sagrados en tu preciada piel para que los espíritus de este lugar no te teman».

languages.text: {n}L'ancienne tourne les yeux vers Ulfar.{/n} « Grand esprit de l'Aigle-Dieu, nous vous accueillons avec joie. Avec l'huile extraite des glands des chênes noirs, cette dirigeante va oindre les jointures de votre peau de fer pour que jamais elles ne se corrodent. Puis elle tracera des symboles sacrés sur votre précieuse peau, afin que les esprits de ces lieux ne vous craignent pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}The elder shifts her gaze to Ulfar.{/n} "Great spirit of the Eagle-God, we are glad to see you. This ruler will have the joints of your iron skin anointed with the oil of dire oak acorns so that they never corrode. And she will have sacred symbols drawn on your precious skin so that the spirits of this place may have no fear of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}La vieille prêtresse tourne les yeux vers Ulfar.{/n} « Grand esprit de l'Aigle-Dieu, nous vous accueillons avec joie. Avec l'huile extraite des glands des chênes noirs, cette dirigeante va oindre les jointures de votre peau de fer pour que jamais elles ne se corrodent. Puis elle tracera des symboles sacrés sur votre précieuse peau, afin que les esprits de ces lieux ne vous craignent pas. »

languages.text: {n}老人は視線をウルファーに移した。{/n}「偉大なる鷲神の精霊よ、お会いできて嬉しい。この支配者は、あなたの鉄の皮膚が腐食しないよう、つなぎ目にダイアーオークどんぐりの油を注く。そして、この地の精霊があなたを恐れることがないように、あなたの大切な皮膚に神聖なシンボルを描くでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}The elder shifts her gaze to Ulfar.{/n} "Great spirit of the Eagle-God, we are glad to see you. This ruler will have the joints of your iron skin anointed with the oil of dire oak acorns so that they never corrode. And she will have sacred symbols drawn on your precious skin so that the spirits of this place may have no fear of you."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は視線をウルファーに移した。{/n}「偉大なる鷲神の精霊よ、お会いできて嬉しい。この支配者は、あなたの鉄の皮膚が腐食しないよう、つなぎ目にダイアーオークどんぐりの油を注く。そして、この地の精霊があなたを恐れることがないように、あなたの大切な皮膚に神聖なシンボルを描くでしょう」

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar, bakışlarını Ulfar'a çeviriyor.{/n} "Kartal Tanrı'nın yüce ruhu, seni gördüğümüze memnunuz. Bu cetvel, demirden derinin eklemlerine ulu meşe palamudu yağı sürecek ki asla paslanmasın. O da bu topraklarda yaşayan ruhlar senden korkmasın diye kıymetli derini kutsal sembollerle süsletecek."
languages.original_text: {n}The elder shifts her gaze to Ulfar.{/n} "Great spirit of the Eagle-God, we are glad to see you. This ruler will have the joints of your iron skin anointed with the oil of dire oak acorns so that they never corrode. And she will have sacred symbols drawn on your precious skin so that the spirits of this place may have no fear of you."
